settings.content: FREE SHIPPING ALL OVER INDIA !

settings.title: About the shop
settings.content:
Nereus London is a Luxury Beauty Care Brand without the plastic impact. Using only natural formulations, delivered in fully recyclable, non-black plastic and biodegradable materials.

Nereus London Ltd Company No 12171006

settings.title: Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.text:
FREE SHIPPING ABOVE Rs. 999/-

Excited about getting your ellipstore jewelry? That's the reason we ship your order with the fastest & secure courier company so it reaches to you within 3-6 working days. Also to keep you updated we send you your tracking link on your mail (within 24-48 hrs) or you can track directly by clicking here. We promise you're going to love the overall experience :) *Due to lockdown restrictions, processing time might take longer than usual click here to know more
settings.text2: RETURN/EXCHANGE We offer a 7 day exchange or refund guarantee. This 7 day window begins after the product has been delivered to you :) To return your items, you can easily proceed by clicking here

settings.title: Join us today to start experiencing Luxury without the impact
settings.content: Subscribe today and get 10% discount, notified about future product launches, special offers and company news.

settings.heading: A New Approach
settings.newsletter_text:
LUXURY BEAUTY WITHOUT THE PLASTIC IMPACT

COMING SOON

Subscribe to get notified about product launches, special offers and company news.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 1-3 business days to arrive in the UK. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.title: Are Nereus London products ethical and sustainable?
settings.answer: Yes, they are. We personally visited, interviewed and vetted all of our suppliers and manufacturers, so we could make sure that their values reflected ours, and that their business practices were ethical and sustainable.

settings.title: What are the bottles made from?
settings.answer: Our bottles and caps are made from infinitely recyclable aluminium.

settings.title: Are Nereus London products tested on animals?
settings.answer: No, they’re not. We only use natural ingredients and formulations that were happily tested on ourselves, not animals. Hopefully our founders hair and skin shows the results.

settings.title: Do Nereus London products contain sulfates?
settings.answer: No, we do not. All the ingredients we use are natural and non-damaging to the environment.

settings.title: Do Nereus London products contain parabens?
settings.answer: No, they do not.

settings.title: Do Nereus London products contain silicones or SLS?
settings.answer: No, they do not.

settings.title: Are Nereus London products vegan?
settings.answer: Yes, they are. We check every single ingredient we use to make our products so that we can guarantee that they are plant-based only formulations.

settings.title: Are Nereus London products gluten-free?
settings.answer: Yes, our products do not contain any gluten.

settings.title: What makes Nereus London products different?
settings.answer: Our products bridge the gap between sustainability and luxury in the sphere of beauty products. We have shampoo, conditioner, and body washes that not only smell wonderful and perform to an award-winning standard, but they’re also ethical, natural, and sustainable.

settings.title: Do Nereus London products work?
settings.answer: Yes, they do. Our products have won multiple awards for their performance, so we’re confident that they’re great for hair and skin.

settings.title: How do Nereus London products smell?
settings.answer: In a word, Amazing! Our fragrances are 100% organic and natural, they are ethically sourced from sustainable farmers. Our founders spent weeks designing the fragrances with a leading essential oils supplier. This ensures that they have a fresh, organic and highest quality that you might find in a luxury spa.

settings.title: Where do Nereus London’s essential oils come from?
settings.answer: Our oils come from ethical sustainable farms around the world that we have personal relationship. This allows us to ensure quality and results are high.

settings.title: Does Nereus London use any black plastic?
settings.answer: No, we do not. We don’t use any plastic in our products and through our partnership with Plastic Bank, we make sure that with every bottle of Nereus London sold, 1kg of ocean-bound plastic is recovered and properly processed.

settings.title: What makes Nereus London plastic-free?
settings.answer: We do not use plastic in our packaging or containers, including the packaging used to deliver our products. We are always looking for better solutions to single use Plastic and how we can eco friendly materials.

settings.title: How does Nereus London’s Plastic Bank partnership work?
settings.answer: With every bottle of Nereus London sold, Plastic Bank recovers 1kg of ocean-bound plastic and ensure that it is properly processed.For more details, feel free to visit their site - https://plasticbank.com/

settings.title: What hair types are Nereus London’s shampoo and conditioner for?
settings.answer: Our shampoos are suitable for all hair types. We designed our shampoo and conditioner to be for everyday use, rather than any specific hair type or treatment. However watch this space for our specialist range of Shampoos coming soon.

settings.title: Are your products natural?
settings.answer: Yes, are formulations are made from naturally derived ingredients. The % varies from 98.5% to 90.1%. All formulations are made of over 90% naturally derived ingredients. We still need to use some synthetic materials for specific formulations, but we plan to be 100% natural in the near future. Our fragrances are 100% natural and organic.

settings.title: Are your fragrances 100% natural?
settings.answer: Yes, our fragrances are 100% natural and organic. We also know exactly where they are sourced from and maintain a close relationship with our suppliers. Our founders also designed and selected the fragrances based on sustainable principles and quality.

settings.title: Are you organic?
settings.answer: Yes, all our essential oils are organically produced to SOIL certification standards.

settings.title: What makes your products premium?
settings.answer: Nereus London’s products are expertly designed using only the finest materials for our plastic free packaging, the highest quality natural active ingredients and only the purest essential oils for our formulations. Our fragrances are truly of aLuxury Spa quality and will leave your hair, skin and bathroom smelling divine.You will see noticeable improvement to your skin and hair from using our award winning products.

settings.title: Is Nereus London’s shampoo and conditioner safe for dyed hair?
settings.answer: Yes, our products contain natural ingredients and will not impact dyed hair.

settings.title: Is your hair award winning?
settings.answer: Yes we have been nominated and won multiple awards for our products. We are very proud of our awards as we are a new brand beating some large brands. We spent time perfecting our formulations. As we like to say, we are more than just beautiful packaging.

settings.title: Where can I buy Nereus London products?
settings.answer: From our website is the best for latest deals and new arrivals. We are also stocked on the KingsRoad with The Cherry Moon. Online: Oxygen Boutique, Wearth London, Little GreenHeart, Modafirma, The Organic Boutique, Bazar Ethical Marketplace, Coraland Whole Sale, Creoate, Curate Beauty

settings.title: Contact Us
settings.answer:
Tel: +44 20 3886 1377

Email: info@nereus.uk

settings.title: Any Question? Let us know
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: Want to stock Nereus London?
settings.answer:
We sell whole sale to stores looking for premium sustainable hair and body care products.

We have a great relationship with all our stockiest.

Do reach out for pricing:

Tel: +44 20 3886 1377

Email: info@nereus.uk

settings.title: The Nereus London Approach To Beauty Care
Luxury Hair and Body Care Gift Sets

settings.html_area:
Instagram

Follow us @whitehaathidesigns

settings.videodescription: Handcrafted jewellery, but make it fun! Our jewellery is meant to be experimented with be it with day looks, night ensembles or transitional outfits or occasions. Easy to style and the epitome of elegance, the jewelry adds up to all your looks and elevates style so effortlessly. Thoughtfully designed for the modern day women, we know how important it is for jewelry to stand out, and that is the core value of our creation process.

settings.quote:
I was looking for some decent jewellery that looks classy yet different. Searing through options on Amazon I saw this gorgeous necklace from White hathi. Trust me, this is a perfect piece with perfect finish that will go well with every outfit of yours.Thank you White Haathi

Rihanna Rajput

Received this very sleek & beautiful bracelet, and just loved the minimal look and design. It feels absolutely stunning wearing this, also very easy to wear as it has pull-up lock system. Will love to purchase more from their collection

Recently I have purchased a beautiful piece from white haathi and I am really very happy with my purchase.

The design looks so elegant and classy with good packaging and certification included .

settings.videodescription: Hello Gorgeous, own your shine’ is what came to our mind every time we thought of customers receiving our gift of love. It is personal and we wanted to deliver that emotion through the words so that they feel what we feel about them. Designed keeping minimal ideas and clean aesthetics in mind and also the environment, our packaging does not contain any plastic and can be used to store jewelry for however long needed. It’s effective, functional and fun, just like our designs.

Our jewelry is handcrafted by local Indian artisans. The core value of brand is uplifting the tedious yet beautiful work of these artisans who were otherwise losing their jobs due to the rise of the pandemic in 2020. They are our brand’s strong pillars and the true visionaries.
